risk_clauses.clause: The District reserves the right to withdraw the award to a successful Company within 30 days of the award if, in the opinion of the District, the successful Company is unable or unwilling to enter into a form of contract satisfactory to the District.
risk_clauses.risk: This clause allows the District to terminate the contract unilaterally, posing a high risk for the vendor, as it may be terminated without notice or justification.
risk_clauses.alternative: Either party may terminate the agreement with a 30-day written notice.

risk_clauses.clause: All completed proposals submitted in response to this RFP become the property of the District upon submission.
risk_clauses.risk: This clause implies unlimited liability without defining scope or fault, posing a high risk for the vendor.
risk_clauses.alternative: The vendor shall indemnify the client for direct losses arising from proven negligence.

risk_clauses.clause: The cost of preparing and submitting a response to this RFP will be assumed solely by each Proposer, whether or not any agreement is signed as a result of the RFP.
risk_clauses.risk: This clause may pose a risk for the vendor if the District uses the proposal for purposes other than evaluation.
risk_clauses.alternative: The District shall use the proposal solely for evaluation purposes.
